mapper.select: select board_no, board_category, book_no, reply_no, secret_flag, title, content, board_pw, notice_flag, board_file, writer, view_cnt, write_date from board order by write_date desc

select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from board
lower(board_category) like #{category}
title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
(title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') or (writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
order by notice_flag desc, write_date desc ) a ) b where b.rn > (#{currentPage} - 1) * 10
and b.rn <= (#{currentPage} * 10)

select count(1) from board
lower(board_category) like #{category}
title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
(title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') or (writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, board_category, book_no, secret_flag, title, content, board_pw, notice_flag, writer, board_file) values(board_seq.nextval, #{boardCategory}, #{bookNo}, #{secretFlag}, #{title}, #{content}, #{boardPw}, #{noticeFlag}, #{writer}, #{boardFile})
mapper.update: update board set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select:
select * from board where write_date = ( select max(write_date) from board
where write_date < TO_DATE(#{writeDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
)
and write_date < TO_DATE(#{writeDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and lower(board_category) like #{boardCategory} order by write_date desc
